p: The measurement of antiradical activity was tested using the Blois method [ 22] as described by Brand-Williams et al. [ 23] with some modifications. The principle of this method is based on the measurement of DPPH (2,2-diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl) free radical scavenging in solution in methanol according to the reaction in Figure 1.
